Home.page_description: Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker is a forensic medical expert, with more than 20 years of experience.
Home.title: Forensic consulting services
Home.testimonials1_text: We are lucky that we have met Dr. Abi Chaker. We were impressed with his skillfull evaluation of our case, he assisted us professionally, answered all our questions and cleared all doubts we had in mind. He is a responsible, knowledgeable, understanding, sincere, honest, and devoted specialist. Thank you.
Home.testimonials2_text: Dr. Abi Chaker guided us during difficult times with much care about our situation. He conducted the consultation with high professionalism and sincere concerns into finding the true cause behind the death of our beloved family member. He alleviated our distress by not having to carry on with our lives with the mistery of a such loss.
Home.testimonials3_text: A local recommended us a highly professional legal doctor. Our case was very sensitive.We are very grateful for the consultation of Dr. Abi Chaker. We would definetly recommend to any person seeking a legal doctor with such a high experience and proven reputation in the field of forensic medicine.

ApieMane.page_description: Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker is a forensic medical expert, with more than 20 years of experience.
ApieMane.title: Gregoire ABI CHAKER
ApieMane.subtitle: Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker is a forensic medical expert, with more than 20 years of experience.
ApieMane.description:
Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker is a private, independant forensic medical expert (included in the list of forensic experts of the Republic of Lithuania (https://shorturl.at/aLST5), who has the qualification to perform examinations of live and dead persons, forensic medicine doctor's license (No. MPL-09604). Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker has a work experience in the field of forensic medicine since 1999.

Forensic medical expert Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker provides consultation on all forensic issues and provides reports (expert opinion), his knowledge is based on many years of work practice, the principle of objectivity, comprehensibility and attentiveness of the global scientific literature. Forensic medical expert Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker has more than 20 years of work experience in Lithuania inthe field of forensic medicine, has performed more than 3,000 forensic examinations of the dead (autopsies) and more than 5,000 forensic examinations of living persons.

GyvuAsmenuTryimai.page_description: Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker is a forensic medical expert, that provides clinical forensic medicine services.
GyvuAsmenuTryimai.title: Clinical forensic medicine
GyvuAsmenuTryimai.service1_title: All issues of forensic medical examinations of living persons
GyvuAsmenuTryimai.service2_title: Forensic medical examination (abduction) of living persons and issuing a forensic report
GyvuAsmenuTryimai.service3_title: Determination of the injuries, the method of inflicting the injuries, the time of inflicting the injuries, the extent of the health impairment
GyvuAsmenuTryimai.service4_title: Analyzing the medical documents of living persons and write a forensic report
GyvuAsmenuTryimai.service5_title: Analyzing the opinion, the forensic reports of other specialists
GyvuAsmenuTryimai.service6_title: All issues related to alcohol, Driving under the influence of alcohol (DUIA), levels of intoxication, determination of drunkenness or sobriety, principles of breathalyzer operation, reliability of breathalyzer readings, and other issues related to alcohol
GyvuAsmenuTryimai.service7_title: All issues related to drugs, Driving under the influence of drugs (DUID), finding drugs in blood, urine, and other issues related to drugs
GyvuAsmenuTryimai.service9_title: Issues related to body disfigurement, scars, etc.

MirusiuAsmenuTyrimai.page_description: Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker is a forensic medical expert, that provides forensic pathology services.
MirusiuAsmenuTyrimai.title: Forensic pathology
MirusiuAsmenuTyrimai.service2_title: Forensic examination (autopsy) of the deceased persons and issues a forensic report
MirusiuAsmenuTyrimai.service3_title: Analyzing the medical documents of the deceased persons and issues a forensic report
MirusiuAsmenuTyrimai.service5_title: Issues related to the cause of death, time of death, injuries to the dead body (nature of injuries, method of infliction, time of infliction and what degree of health impairment the injuries correspond to)

DUK.page_description: Dr. Gregoire Abi Chaker is a forensic medical expert, that provides forensic pathology services. FAQ.
DUK.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
DUK.question1: Are consultations and forensic reports presented in lithuanian?
DUK.answer1: Consultations and all documents provided to clients, including the forensic reports, are in lithuanian.
DUK.question2: Where do the consultations take place?
DUK.answer2: For consultation, please contact Dr. Abi Chaker. A mutually acceptable time and place is agreed upon individually.
DUK.answer3: The price of the services is contractual - it is determined based on specifity of the case.
DUK.question4: What are the benefits of the services of the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker?
DUK.answer4: Consultations by private forensic expert Gregoire Abi Chaker help individuals, their relatives and lawyers understand the forensic aspects of their specific case.
DUK.question5: What consultations (services) related to living persons are provided?
DUK.answer5: During the consultation and conducting forensic examinations of living persons, the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker can answer questions related to injuries, the method of injury (mechanism of injury, the force used to sustain injury, etc.), the time of injury, and the extent of health impairment. During the consultation and conducting forensic examinations of living persons, the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker can also answer the following questions: can the extent of the health impairment change after the end of the treatment? Can the consequences of the health condition experienced due to the injury (residual effects of the injuries) change the extent of the health impairment? Does trauma always has residual effects on the health of individual? In what cases trauma has no residual effects on the health of individual? Do all injuries cause pain? How long after an injury can pain occur? In what cases can a person does not feel pain? Can the pain be caused only by trauma? The private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker also answers other questions that require special knowledge.
DUK.question6: Does the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker consults cases of sexual assaults?
DUK.answer6: During the consultation and conducting forensic examinations of living persons, the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker answers questions related to cases of sexual assaults (rape, etc.).
DUK.question7: Does the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker consult cases related to body disfigurement, scars, etc.?
DUK.answer7: The private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker provides consultation on issues related to irreparable disfigurement, scars, how they were sustained, when they were sustained, what is the extent of health impairment do they correspond to, what is the possibility of their removal, etc.
DUK.question8: What consultations (services) about death are provided?
DUK.answer8: During the consultation and conducting forensic examination of the deceased private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker answers questions related to the cause of death, time of death, body injuries - biomechanics of injury, time of injury, etc. During the consultation and after conducting the forensic examination of the deceased, the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker can also answer other questions related to the impact of the injuries found in the body of the deceased, whether the deceased experienced pain before death, how long could he be alive after sustaining the injuries, whether it was possible to save his life if help was provided in a timely manner, whether the treatment was adequate and/or the treatment and lack of treatment did not contribute to the death, whether the deceased was under the the influence of alcohol and/or other drugs at the time of death, and whether alcohol and/or other drugs contributed to the death. The private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker also answers other questions that require special knowledge.
DUK.question9: Can the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker issue (write out) a death certificate?
DUK.answer9: When a beloved one dies, for various reasons the family doctor may refuse to issue a death certificate. In such and other cases, the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker can provide assistance and issue a certificate of death.
DUK.question10: What consultations (services) related to alcohol, drunkenness, and breathalyzer can the private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker provide?
DUK.answer10: The private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker provides consultation on all issues related to alcohol: was the person sober while driving? Was the person drunk while driving? Are breathalyzer readings accurate? What was the degree of drunkenness? The private forensic medical expert Gregoire Abi Chaker can also answer other alcohol-related questions that require special knowledge.
